Name: Network
Description: Allow you to display your association in a Network

Options.Description: Indicates the number of caracter you need to have a carriage return. Put 0 if you never want to have carriage return
list the scriptname of the objectType and the popOut
list the nodeIDs and the assignGroup
List the groups you want to display when the network is started. Use comma separator

Select the direction of each node. For exemple, processus_niveau_2_20006_883051288,'to'#processus_niveau_2_20005_1079817132,'from'. Use to, if you want the arrow that arrive to this node. Use from, if you want the arrow to leave from this node.
Select Nodes that would be use to filter Node. nodeID:FilterName#nodeID2:FilterName2
Select Nodes you want to add that are not under your layout network (see documentation for exemple)
List the Cluster you want to apply when the network is started. Head#Child,Child2

Options.DisplayName: External Filter To Select On Start

Options.Description: Activate the button to unzip edge
Activate this button to zip the edge at start
Activate button to disable the physics
Activate the option to remove lonely object
